transcript:
Customer: Hello

Executive: Hello

Customer: Hello

Executive: Haan boliye.

Executive: Ji namaskar sir.

Customer: Haan bolo.

Executive: Sir main ye keh raha tha na wo subah jo maine call kiya tha aapko ticket ko leke.

Customer: Haan.

Executive: Usme na actually kya hai ki jo hamari personal meeting hui thi. Right maine usse pehle aapko call kiya tha to uske baad aapne mujhe call kiya aur aapne call kiya to main utha nahi paya. To us cheez ko leke na ticket open ho gaya tha to wo ticket jo hai wo discussion hoga uske baad hi close hoga. To main do char cheeze discuss karna chahunga. Ek cheez maine aapko tender batai thi. Right.
Tender means ki ek rental hota hai right but aap manufacturing karke sale karte hain right.

Customer: To discussion apna ho hi chuka hai fir kyun phone chalu rakhne ka kya matlab hai.

Executive: Nahi sir phone chalu nahi rakh raha hu actually wo ticket close karna hai to uske liye teen char pointers hai jo discuss karna jaruri hai.

Customer: Meeting meeting call to diya hai aapko recording to hota hi hai na.

Executive: Haan bilkul sir but without discussion main nahi close kar sakta warna main subah hi kar diya hota. Lekin maine ticket raise hi nahi kiya hai mera to koi concern nahi hai to kahe ko fir karne ka.

Executive: Nahi aap suniye nahi mera kehne ka matlab hai ki koi bhi client call karta hai aur agar uski call hum nahi utha pate hain to wo automatic ticket open ho jata hai ki maine call kyun nahi uthai. Right. To isiliye maine subah phone kiya tha aapne bola ki close kar do to main close karne hi ja raha tha but usme tha ki without discussion close nahi hoga. To isiliye maine call kiya. Right. Do char cheeze discuss kar lunga. Tender jo main aapko bata raha tha tender waise to ek matlab rental service hoti hai. Thik hai but aapka kam ye hai ki aap manufacturing karte hain machineon ki right.

Customer: Hello.

Customer: Haan bolte bolte raho na mere ko koi kam kam nahi hai main kya discussion karunga aapka system aapke liye loop hole hai hamare liye koi kam nahi hai main mana to kar diya mera mera koi problem hi nahi hai fir kya discuss karne ka bar bar.

Executive: Nahi problem nahi hai but ye hai ki agar do char pointer hum discuss karenge ho sakta hai ki kahin se koi business opportunity nikle. Jaise us din maine call kiya tha.

Customer: Do teen do din pehle kar baithe hain video meeting pura karke baithe hain fir kya point discuss karte rehne ka. Dusra bhi kam rahega na.

Executive: Haan bilkul ab usme aap ek cheez dekhiye us din humne video meeting ki thi aur maine aapko lead bataye the aapne saat lead us din not relevant kare the right lekin uske baad ek lead mili na aapko aapne ek lead consume kiya tha.

Customer: Aap mera time waste mat kijiye koi matlab nahi hai discussion karne ka jo cheez ho chuki hai wo barabar hai aapka system mein koi problem hai to aap ab wo wo dekh lijiye baki mere ko koi abhi koi aapke system mein problem nahi hai sir aur na main aapka time kharab kar raha hu main bas yahi keh raha hu ki do char cheeze agar hum discuss kar lenge us din humne by lead pe baat cheet kari.

Customer: Kyun karne ka ek ghante ek do din pehle to yaar ek ghanta discussion kiya hai bar bar kya discuss karte rehne ka humko kya dusra kam nahi rahega kya.

Executive: Main samajh raha hu sir but ek aap logo ka ticket close karne ke liye kya mere ko mera time waste karne ka phokat mein.

Customer: Mere ko concern rahega to call karunga na kyun maine bola maine call hi nahi kiya mere ko kam hi nahi hai to fir kya baat karte rehne ka phokat mein.

Executive: Sir main bhi wahi keh raha hu main aapki hi baat kar raha hu.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer does not want to discuss further.

- Customer says his system has no problem.



Resolution:

- Executive explained the ticket opening process.

- Executive tried to explain benefits of discussion.



Next Steps: 

- Issue not resolved.

- None



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Angry



@@@Key Topics:

- ticket, discussion, leads, time waste
